test.name: Delete duplicate records before running other tests

kw.name: Read SQL file and Execute Delete Query
Get File
kw.msg: ${sql_commands} = DELETE FROM film WHERE film_id IN ( WITH DuplicateCTE AS ( SELECT film_id FROM ( SELECT film_id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( ...
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.

kw.name: Connect To Database
kw.msg: Connect to DB using : psycopg2.connect(database='greencycles', user='postgres', password=***, host='localhost', port=5432)
kw.doc: Creates a database connection using the DB API 2.0 ``db_module`` and the parameters provided. Along with listed commonly used arguments (`db_name`, `db_host` etc.) you can set any other DB module specific parameters as key/value pairs.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Execute Sql String
kw.msg:
Executing sql:
DELETE FROM film WHERE film_id IN ( WITH DuplicateCTE AS ( SELECT film_id FROM ( SELECT film_id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY title -- Columns that define a duplicate ORDER BY film_id -- Column to decide which one to keep ) AS RowNumber FROM film ) AS s WHERE RowNumber > 1 ) SELECT film_id FROM DuplicateCTE );
kw.doc: Executes the ``sql_string`` - as a single SQL command (default) or as separate statements.

kw.name: Log
kw.msg: SQL commands executed successfully and result obtained : None
kw.arg: SQL commands executed successfully and result obtained : ${query_result}
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Disconnect From Database
kw.doc: Disconnects from the database.
